entry.title: $2000 // Huge 1 bedroom with tons of exposed brick!
entry.content:
ID: 19377

Wow! Huge 1 bedroom with tons of exposed brick! Heat and hot water included. Reside within steps to restaurants, coffee shops, laundry, grocery stores, beer gardens, boutiques, Prospect Park, Brooklyn museum, close to the Nostrand Av (3) - 6 min., 0.24 miles; Park Place (FS) - 7 min., 0.33 miles; President St (2, 5) - 9 min., 0.37 miles; Franklin Av (FS, 2, 3, 4, 5) - 10 min., 0.39 miles; Botanic Gardens (FS, 2, 3, 4, 5) - 12 min., 0.45 miles.

AMENITIES
Hardwood Floors
High Ceilings
Exposed Brick
Eat In Kitchen
Natural Light in Living Area

***Please text Vaner at five-1-six-two1-eight-17-three-nine and mention specific ad you're referring to. I'm a real person who can help you find your perfect apartment. I also have plenty of other listings in the same neighborhood, just ask! Foreign applicants welcome, we take insurent and or multiple months paid up front.
